nameEntry.part: Association of Civilian Widows of Australia

place.placeEntry:
Associatio of Civilian Widows of Australia Phone 08-9339-4614 Fax 08-9322-6695 Email streekmoya@hotmail.com
Association Of Civilian Widows Qld Inc Address: 24 Park Avenue Clayfield, QLD 4011 Phone: (07) 3357 9399

biogHist.abstract: The Association of Civilian Widows of Australia originated in Western Australia in 1953 at a meeting convened by the Women's Service Guild. Its formation was largely due to the efforts of Mrs Invy Kent. Over the following two years Apex helped to establish a National Executive and over 200 branches of the Association across Australia. The Association is non-party political and non-sectarian and its objects are to promote the interests of the widow and her child wherever possible. It also engages in welfare work for its members and holds fund raising and social meetings. It's motto is 'Friendship and Service."

resourceRelation.relationEntry: 'Association of Civilian Widows of Australia', in The Australian Women's Register, National Foundation for Australian Women and The University of Melbourne
